verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] , in addition to [V: continuing] [ARG1: the unconscionable separation of Latin American immigrant children from their parents and siblings] [ARGM-LOC: at official border crossings and other places on the southwest border] , has admitted it has no plans ...
